caption: Good beer, friendly staff. They’ve put very little effort into outdoor seating/dining. The beer subscription is a complete ripoff.
Great beer and food but clearly overwhelmed and cranky staff. Their attitudes kinda ruined it for us but will come back to pick up their beer and enjoy it elsewhere
Nice outdoor area with heaters for drinking and food
Good burger
Nice large outdoor space with heaters
Great beer but the heat lamp above was busted so we could only stay for one beer...
Brooklyn's #1 brewery hands down. I order a case of beer a month.
Love there beer. These guys know what there doing , best IPAs, great collection of Sours. Love the vibes inside cool people working there.
Fantastic outdoor accomodations
This beer is very good.
Three's brewing should not be missed. There are many craft beer brewers in the city and this one that should be a stop on anyone's tour through the city.
Fine brewery.
Great beer selection and atmosphere with outdoor seating and music
The beer was served in a can. The kitchen wasn't open until 4pm. However the Gowanus Gold (Rice Lager) had a light, refreshing body that nonetheless went well with the chips.

Was unhappy that their tv's were down unable to broadcast the giants game. That's why I went there. They lost my money that day. Someone should pay attention to current events like the playoffs to accommodate their customers.service is always fast and can't beat the location. Nice to bring our dog to join us.free wifi is nice to have.
The host was unnecessarily rude to everyone. Ruined the experience. Would not recommend.

Maybe the best all around brewery in NYC. Amazing lagers, ipa, and saison. The spurs tend to be too acidic for me but that’s just my taste and doesn’t change how stellar the overall program is. Amazing food as well so a great spot to hang with a large group. Very cool back yard. Great place to have a wedding party (which I did as well a couple years back).
Not bad I liked them.
I recommend this place to all my friends always. Delicious beer and great food.

If you can not imagine your life without a good draft beer, "Threes Brewing" should be your new home. This place was our hidden gem and we couldn't believe we didnt find it earlier.  Great selection of beers and ciders. Bar food is good, but the menu is limited. They also have different events and concerts, which makes this place ideal for the evening gathering with friends.
Nice place

From the minute I had inquired on there website the entire staff at Threes Brewing was beyond accommodating in helping me plan an amazing 30th birthday party this past Saturday evening. The event was a tremendous success and everyone had a blast. Angie was phenomenal and accommodating to all of the guests. We will certainly be back again in the near future.
Trash
Decent selection of beers. 2 stars because this isn’t even a brewery. I don’t know why or how they possibly advertise as one. They don’t have a single house beer...............

(Translated by Google) Best of Brooklyn Brewery. The fried chicken sandwich is also delicious. It's hot but it's not really eating This place gets that mayo is a condiment! Also great beer  (Original) 브루클린 브루어리 중 최고. 프라이 치킨 샌드위치도 존맛. 맵다고 나오지만 실제로 먹어보면 아님 ㅋㅋ This place gets that mayo is a condiment! Also great beer

To the owner(s) and manager(s) at Threes, I was there today at 4:00pm and left feeling like I was not welcomed. If your bar opens at 5, don’t hang a sign that says your insurance does not permit customers from entering your bar while there are 5 people drinking beer at the bar and a 4 top at a table while 2 bartenders are serving drinks and 3 others are cleaning tables/bar. It’s confusing and frustrating to see that and be sternly told by someone (seemingly a manager) that “we open at 5!”. Your beer is good and people wait patiently to try it. Remember that and respect those customers. My fiancé and I were very excited to be there and have your beer, but we couldn’t have been more disappointed.
The beers are outta this world

Threes is a great local brewery that makes a variety of excellent beers. I have been coming here for over 5 years and was impressed after first tasting the Unreliable Narrator. I particularly like the lagers and black lagers that they produced this winter. It's often crowded and can get really loud but no one should be dinged for being successful. They typically have a good selection of canned beers to go which makes acquiring their beer manageable. Another important aspect is that their different beers actually taste different. Unlike so many other breweries, in a world of hop overload, Threes manages to make beers that TASTE distinctly different from each other which is amazing. It's great to have this gem in the neighborhood. Please can "The World is Flat"
good service.
Great brews!
A very cool, hip brewery with amazing craft selection. There's an outdoor seating area and yummy snacks, to boot!
Great beer in a great locale.  Staff is friendly and helpful.

Nope! Came here on a Sunday and experienced the sad reality of the staff’s ignorance. They treated us poorly and hmmm I wonder why???? We didn’t fit the mold of the customer they wanted but don’t you worry, we will never come back.
Victor at the door is the greatest gem in Brooklyn. Such a nice guy with incredible service!
Loved this bar. Worth a visit
Nice atmo... friendly staff. Beer wasn’t great wasn’t bad. Diacetyl present and distracting from what could have been a nice beer (Threes unintentional Fallacy DIPA)
Really good beers and a variety to choose from. Can be a little loud inside but the beer makes up for it!

(Translated by Google) Local with very good atmosphere where to drink tap and eat something. Very good service and friendly treatment  (Original) Local con muy buen ambiente donde tomar cañas de grifo y comer algo. Muy buen servicio y trato amable
Always a good time here! Such a good beer selection and delicious burgers. The patio is great for the summer!
We had an amazing experience for our holiday party! They were gracious and kind, and the food was delicious. All around a fabulous evening!

We had an excellent experience hosting our wedding ceremony and reception at Threes Brewing, Gowanus in Fall 2019! We booked the main bar and yard a year prior and worked with Gretchen and Alise to plan the event. Not only is the venue beautiful in the fall, but the Threes Brewing team was incredibly accommodating to our needs and everything went off without a hitch. The Meat Hook did a great job catering as well, and our guests praised the food. Highly recommend Threes as a budget-friendly option for couples looking to have a Brooklyn wedding.
Pretty good beer, nice little taproom, friendly workers.

I was disappointed how small this brewery was inside. All the other little bars in the area were jam packed so thought there would be more space here. Not so. The inside is really narrow, and long, with no where to sit even though multiple tables were empty because they were "reserved". Despite the limited space, a different seating layout could make this place more tenable.
Decent little brewery! Definitely a younger crowd, lively & fun! During the colder season, they have cover and heat lamps outside which turned out to be an awesome set up when it got packed.
Their dry aged burger with raclette cheese is delicious, one of the best burgers in New York.

I was really underwhelmed by Threes Brewing. The beer was okay, but not good enough to write much about. And I was especially disappointed in my bartenders lack of knowledge about the beer they offer. The space itself is pretty cool and seems like a fun date spot or place to meet up with a group of friends. There's also food offered in the brewery by the Meat Room. The name could be a bit of a turn off for vegetarians, but they do have a few vegetarian options that might also be possible to make vegan, including a Veggie burger and Brussel spouts with tofu.
Beer is good, but don't come hungry. 45+ min wait after ordering overpriced food.

A great spot to grab a beer. The outside area has a ton of space and an extra bar. I think the highlight is the amount of room at Threes - plenty of seating, plenty of standing room, plenty of bars/bartenders, plenty of washrooms. Although it was busy, it didn't feel crowded. Great beers as well! Something for everyone.
Staff was indifferent verging on rude (especially the woman at the front tonight). Food was supremely mediocre.

One of my favorite places in Brooklyn. Just about once a week I’ll take my laptop to do some work in the coffee shop area (an outpost of Ninth Street Coffee) then when 5 o’clock hits, walk a few steps and meet up with friends in the bar. The happy hour special is a great deal ($15 special pitcher). If you’re into IPAs I suggest trying “Logical Conclusion”.
They take themselves way too seriously. What are they? Fine dining. Lame.

Epic sized establishment with a really cool beer selection! I wanted to give this place two stars but I won’t let a seemingly frustrated hipster bartender, that ended up overcharging me then failing to apologize for it and ultimately giving me an attitude over having the bill amended, dramatically impact this places rating. Although the barkeeps are representatives of the establishment , poor service compounded with poor treatment is a testament to the individual character. Assuming mentioning that I’m brown will only exacerbate the review.
Great beer choice, chilled vibe, very friendly staff which is a bonus as we have a very energetic 18 month old who loves to explore! Good from The Meat Hook was phenomenal as well.
Cool brewery with great food, worth the trip for the dry aged burger alone.  That thing was stellar.  Sides are on point and cocktails were fantastic.  Seriously though, that burger is outta bounds.
I hosted my 27th birthday party here & Alise and co. were super accommodating! the beer is also great. would definitely come here again!
Great spot to have freshly brewed craft beer and good food. Fun vibe and atmosphere.
(Translated by Google) The beer did not meet expectations.  (Original) 맥주는 기대에 미치지 못했다.
Enjoy my beer.

The place is great with good customer serservice. The food is amazing but the price is a bit high for some of the meal. They have cool drinks and a lot of different type of beers. The staff is so friendly and helpful and they are going to give you a lot of attention so don`t forget the tip.

Threes is one of a handful of great breweries in the NYC area. This past year they have released progressive, delicious, ground breaking saisons. I am particularly fond of the “eternal return apricot”, “a supposedly fun thing” collab with Hudson Valley Brewing and “remembered self” a collab with Allagash. Threes Brewing is really hitting a stride right now and will be a brewery to watch even closer in the coming years. Hats off ALSO. Meat Hook is the permanent residency kitchen. Which is great. They’re great. YOU’RE GREAT.
Good beer, nice ambiance!
Great beers and enviroment
Very interesting selection of beers! The World is Flat was my favorite, and the IPA's were excellent. Great place for craft beer fans to stop into!

We recently had our wedding at the Threes Brewing Greenpoint location and it was amazing. The venue at night is beautiful with the large windows in the front. The wood throughout the venue made the pictures look amazing. Alyssa kept everything organized and made us feel comfortable the entire time. At one point before the wedding we realized we had not eaten and she went into the back and made us a small sandwich. Way above and beyond. We had family and friends from all over and many said it was one of the best dinners they have ever eaten ever. We were extremely stressed leading up to the event but Alyssa also had suggestions on what previous couples had done as far as guest books, card boxes and music. The bartenders were also great and even signed our guest book. If you are planning a somewhat low key wedding in a beautiful space (and delicious beers), this is the place.

Rented out private event space at the brewery in Gowanus and had a wonderful experience. The event team was incredibly helpful in creating a custom food and beverage package that fit my budget and provided a wonderful event. Night of, everything ran incredibly smoothly. Would highly recommend it.

My fiancé and I threw our engagement party in their private room, and we could not have been happier with it. I’m the type of person that has to look into every single event space before I decide on one, but I was passing by one day, checked it out, and decided in that moment that we would do it there. The staff was so accommodating to our every desire, and just kind/welcoming throughout the process. There was no rental fee for the room and we doubled the beverage minimum. We also had the event on a weekday so it wasn’t too busy, and we were able to spill out onto the main floor. I highly suggest having any kind of party there. Many of our guests asked how they could host an event there as well. From the decorations, the hospitality, and the food/drinks, look no further.
beer

I used to go to the Ninth Street Espresso in this location but I knew I could get a beer in the same place from threes brewery. It is a great place to stop by and get a beer by yourself with working on your computer or just hanging around. The staffs there always have ideas what they suggest by our preferences. Also the temperature of the store is nice with the natural outside breeze.
Good beer, but poor service and unpleasant staff attitude :/

We love Threes Brewing!  My company hosted our launch party in the upstairs space (called Tiny Montgomery) and couldn't have been happier. Everybody we interacted with, from the events coordinator to our private bartender, was fantastically helpful and professional. The pricing was fair and transparent, and, predictably, the beer was delicious. Bravo Threes.

We hosted our wedding rehearsal dinner and welcome event at Threes @ Franklin and Kent and it was a fabulous event. The event coordinators at Threes made the whole process easy from the start by being very responsive and transparent around our options and the pricing. The event went off without a hitch and we got a ton of compliments from our guests on both the food and drinks. I highly recommend Threes as a venue for your special events!
Amazing beers, cool place.

We hosted our daughter's 30th birthday party at Threes Brewing and it couldn't have been more perfect. Alyssa Damiani and Alise Green took excellent care of us during the planning process. Alise and the other on-site staff were excellent! They made everything easy. I've hosted dozens of corporate events and this was great. The private room was perfect and the food was terrific. We were able to decorate beforehand and use their sound system. The cost was exactly as we had discussed - no surprises. Very professional, great venue. Thank you!

Allow me to order brunch for you: “I’ll have the veggie burger and add avocado, egg, lettuce, tomato, and Russian dressing. I’ll also have the fries but make them veg. Thank you so much and I’m going to tip you so well.”  Get a couple of cups of mayo and add hot sauce to them for dipping.  Remember to grab your silverware and drink plenty of water.

Great place for you and your friend to go hang out after work and have a drink. They craft there own beer and have a wide variety of hard liquor and beers .Excellent customer service and you seat your self. The atmosphere is good and I would recommend this place to any one that want to grab a bite and chill.
Coffee is great here!
Really decent beers and a laid back vibe. Felt a little like a Seattle brewery, which is a sure way to get me to come back! They do have food to order here as well!
Awesome beers and great food.

We found Threes by searching for restaurant weddings in Brooklyn. We wanted to have a more casual wedding without the fuss and outdated traditional components- what fits that better than a restaurant run by a brewery in Brooklyn? We began planning about 13 months out from the wedding date. From the beginning, Alyssa from Threes was quick to respond, informative, and accommodating. After meeting with her, I knew we found our venue (we also gained a great place to hangout at)! At Threes at Franklin & Kent (Greenpoint location), you get to work with an amazing team. Purslane is the in-house caterer and they're known for making seriously good catering. The restaurant/bar is spacious, eclectic, and beautiful. Threes' beer is outstanding. Even more, the price point for the rental, bar, and catering is totally reasonable and 100% worth it.  Leading up to the wedding, Alyssa was great about checking in and communicating expectations and changes. The day of we had a minor rain complication and Alyssa swung into action by setting up the parlor room so that our guests could be somewhere until the weather cooperated. She also worked wonderfully with our wedding coordinator and photographer. Not only did our guests love the food and bar, they came up to us personally to tell us how much they loved Alyssa and the staff. I can't think of a compliment higher than that.  I cannot stress enough how important it is to trust your vendors. My partner and I didn't have a concern the entire day because we knew Alyssa and the Threes team was on top of it. You won't be disappointed!
Very good beer selection and some tasty pub eats. A bit loud when the DJ is there, but a fun time.
Cheap & Tasty beer
Very good beer.
Bad food, bad service. Leds than unenjoyable.
Good beer cool vibe
Great beers

Such a fire spot. You can get a four pack of yummy bear for 16 bucks!!! (but you can’t drink it inside the space). All the food is really really good and theres a back space for performances which are super chill. They just do everything good.
A ton of really unique beers to try. Pork buns are unbelievable.
Nice atmosphere,  great selection and professional staff. Will visit again.
(Translated by Google) Very good place It has everything, coffee, food or a variety of beers.  (Original) Muy buen lugar. Tiene de todo, café, comida u variedad de cervezas.
Bar tenders were on it, wings were great and the drinks were awesome
great beer !!. service is good too!!.. food was $$$... but why..  small plate 1 burger on small martins potato roll.. no sides.. 14 bucks..  shoulda stoped at a street kart for chicken and rice
Manager always Rude. Especially to her employees. Won’t come back!

We had our wedding reception at Threes in December 2018 and couldn't have been happier with how everything turned out. From the beginning of the process Alyssa was such a pleasure to work with to finalize all the details. Our group was ~120 people and the staff did such a great job accommodating all of us. Our guests still tell us it was one of the most fun wedding they've been to - with the BEST beer list. Meat Hook Catering was excellent. I also truly appreciated that Three's included so much in their services - we only brought in some flowers, dessert and a few decorations. They did the rest and even set up our decorations for us. Five star service across the board. Thank you to all the staff at Three's for making our wedding truly memorable and FUN! - Jill & Luke
(Translated by Google) The servers are willing to revisit where they have a kind and curious beer lineup.  (Original) 서버들도 친절하고 호기심을 갖게 할만한 맥주라인업을 갖추고 있는 곳, 재방문 의사 있다.
My aunt had her wedding here, boring place to have a wedding there because of the heat, though food was good, still boring cause of the wedding
I really enjoyed the beer selection and the decor was impressive. We didn’t have any food so can’t comment but if we come to Brooklyn again we will definitely stop in.

Alyssa and the Threes Brewing team were a pleasure to work with.  Our wedding 'Welcome Party' went off without any issues and the Threes team went above and beyond to make the event memorable.  The beer, wine and food were all delicious and the space was cozy and more than we could ask for the party of 50.
Worst cannot describe my love for Threes!

My family went to Threes Brewing for drinks and dinner and they were accommodating to children and the beer and food was delicious. We looked around and saw that they had a beautiful space for an intimate party, so we planned a bash for my husband's 50th, had about 40 guests. The space was perfect, the drinks amazing, the sound system was rocking, and the staff were so attentive, kind and courteous to everyone, I couldn't have asked for anything more. They were fantastic and made our party so special. I can only sing their praises-- they are the best!
These folks are brewing up new great beers all the time. Stay tuned for innovative creations to come.
Great beer and a fun atmosphere. Live music upstairs, as well as other activities like trivia other nights of the week.
Hill Farmstead? Yes please. Also great burgers.
If you like craft brews, this is a great brewery. If you're in Brooklyn, this is a great spot. If you have no where to go, go here.
Awesome brewery with a great beer selection and small snacks.
Great beer. Patio in the back is a plus with the large crowds. One of the best burgers in the neighborhood.
Fun
Great atmosphere.  Happened in for reggae night which was pretty awesome.  The help was outstanding!  Thanks for the experience!

Beautiful tap room, nice setup, but there was a distinct off flavor and blandness in the beer.  The imperial stout had a oily/latexy type finish that id chalk up to DMS/diacetyl which is odd coming from a stout, and the imperial barrel aged porter left a lot to be desired with a sweet type finish that did not feel barrell aged.  Ive fought through some bad beer and these were a tough finish.  I hope that this was the result of a bad batch because the rest of the experience was nice.
Great beer, but they also have a good selection of hard alcohol. Outdoor space when it's warm

Hosted a corporate holiday party in the Winterized Tents at Threes last night and had such a blast.  The staff couldn't have been more helpful or accommodating and the food, drink and space were all awesome.  Definitely will be back for drink soon, but can't say enough great things about hosting a private event.  Thank you!!

It's sad when you read reviews and people complain about a places size.. Threes is amazing. When it comes to what actually matters, (beer and food) it's very hard to compare to any other establishment. Pairing with meat hook was a very bold move! The reason for my missing star is for a few critical reasons. -Layout.. It's a brewery.. The restaraunt part is an accommodation. Threes doesnt have that classic hops aroma when you first walk in that reminds you know you came for their amazing beer that everyone is talking about all over the tri state area.. Why does the front entry have so much wasted space?!?!?! It's the exact reason why people are complaining about the crammed bar.. -Bar staff, I've yet to meet a tender at Threes that has any sort of knowledge of beer besides just reading the description on the menu... It's not that hard to teach this info, just a little time investment.  With the minor negatives out of the way, I'd love to emphasize that Threes has some of the best brews I've ever had. My upmost respect to the brewers as well as their neighboring collaborators. You've proven to myself and many others that park slope isnt just masses of people having kids and participating in food co-ops. Not to leave out that hot Nash chicken... GD Meat hook, that thing is award winning. Thank you guys, keep up the good work and vibes in the community.

A nice bar and nice service but the beer left a lot to be desired. Tried 3 different ones - a couple of IPAs and a hoppy lager - and all of them had significant off flavors. If you dont mind that in your craft then you'll probably enjoy however of you can taste DMS or Diac I'd stick to guest beers.
Extremely chill, amazing beer and food, friendliest possible people.
This place is huge, so there are many options for places to sit with a group which is great.
Fantastic brewery turning out usually perfect beer. Nice space - food options - awesome back yard/ garden but can get a little too crowded on weekends. But ultimately: Such.Good.Beer.
really awesome beerz
Great burgers

(Translated by Google) It is a lively beer pub. It may be hard to order as there are many people. Beer is particularly delicious as a hoppy one. There seems to be food, too.  (Original) 賑やかなビアパブです。人が多いと注文に苦労するかも。ビールはホッピーなものが特に美味しいです。食べ物もあるようです。
Tons of selection of beer and craft drinks. Good selection of food. I love the backyard space during the warmer weather!
Great bar and brewery. Solid hamburger.

The Threes team - specifically Alyssa, worked wonders to make my celebration ideal.  They helped to coordinate everything for me and made the process as easy as possible while still hearing me out on all of my needs.  We hosted about 50 people and the accomdations and service were beyond stellar.  I have loved Threes simply as a neighborhood brewery but now they have surpassed my expcetations by helping me throw a perfect private party as well.

Recently held our annual Thanksgiving Eve Alumni event at Three's and were beyond happy with the experience.  The venue has great customer service from top to bottom.  They were not only flexible with our menu but also were wonderful in helping make the event even better than it had been in past year's.  We moved it from another local bar and will for sure be hosting it here for year's to come. The Tiny Montgomery space was perfect for our party of about 60 to mingle (could have easily accommodated a few more), and having a private bar/bartender made it even easier for our guests to not have to leave the space. Highly recommend this venue for any of your personal or professional events. Special shout-out to our event manager Alise and the team for making it a memorable night for us!
A great brewery to hang, drink, and eat in and a great place to host an event. We hosted 70 of our closest family and friends in their heated tent, and it was absolutely wonderful!

Beer was fine for a small brewery, but the crowded, unorganized space made for an unpleasant atmosphere. Food menu was very overpriced for bare plates and mediocre food. Would love to give their brews another shot as I have heard good things, but not sure I want to return to the space.

My husband and I hosted our wedding Welcome Dinner (the Friday before our wedding) at Three's at Franklin + Kent.  Alyssa was so helpful from start to finish in organizing our drink package, setting us up with their exclusive (and delicious) caterer and making sure the space the set up to our liking.  The space was perfect for our event of 75 people; we didn't need to add much decor as the space itself is beautiful with plants and candles already provided.  The food was delicious, the drinks and service great and our guests had a great time.  We would definitely host another event at Threes!

Nice atmosphere. Cheese burger was way over priced and when it arrived it was super basic. Cheap bun, cheap cheese, a few pickles. No toppings. Customer service was terrible. Manager was rude. Was clearly annoyed we asked questions about the menu.

Very rude staff, specially the one at register. She literally said “if you don’t like it, you can go somewhere else!” They don’t serve anything but flat McDonald style cheese burger between 5pm- 5:30pm  Great place but staff are terrible! We asked for manager and 2 staff pointed out another staff as their are the manager and eventually no one showed up to our table.

Cute atmosphere, but the people who work here are miserable! Want service with a smile? Go someplace else. No one here likes to answer any questions you may have about anything on their menu without serving you an eye roll or three.
Awesome place. Very casual and good beer.
Great space (outdoor and indoor) and love the meat hook!
Really nice vibe, very kind customer service everytime I have visited this place. Ice cofee is good and espresso’s are good as well.

Great local brewery, we will be back! They have a place you can order food brought to your table  (we had the fries, which can be made vegetarian and are delicious) and we took them out back to the tent which was heated and has vines/potted plants (you find your own seat and bring your table number). We enjoyed the beer and took cans to go. You can see one tank through a window to see their brewing and we saw signs for live music upstairs.
Awesome beers. The IPAs were all very good! Very much enjoyed our time here.
The garden area in the back is awesome for warm nights. Cool selection of beers as well.
Great selection and flavorful beer with some great collaborations. Very cool ambiance too.

Threes Brewing is such an awesome place to visit. Everyone that works there is helpful and knowledgeable, and the beers are all amazing. The shop is awesome too, as there is always a wide variety of not only Threes but other breweries' beers as well. The Meat Hook has some really great food as well. Definitely plan to eat at the brewery.

I cannot recommend hosting a private event at Threes highly enough. We held the second day of our wedding festivities in the backyard space and it couldn't have been more ideal. We had the space from 1-6pm for roughly 80 people -- complete with the full pig roast, open bar, etc. The staff is incredible. Alyssa and Gretchen were so easy to work with, both extremely friendly and accommodating. The staff day-of was also amazing. The bartender made stellar drinks all afternoon and the food staff killed it. The food was to die for - roast pork is hard to beat, but the brussels sprouts can't be missed. We wouldn't change a single thing about our experience. I would recommend hosting a bbq style event here any time, to anyone. I wish we could do it every weekend!
They had something from a regional brewery I love, Burial (Asheville). their stuff was great too. 👌

A $13 cocktail that was admittedly good but only filled about a third of the glass and an abundance of children in a bar that has a posted sign saying "no children after 7pm" makes this place hard to love
Cool atmosphere and good beer!
Great backyard patio
Badass burger

Popped in here on short notice to rent out their back performance room and it was an absolute dream! Both Gretchen and Emily were immensely accommodating, they did everything possible to manage their noise levels for our rental period, and we were able to order right into our holding room for lunch. Incredible experience all around, highly recommend as both a bar/restaurant and a filming location.

Under no circumstances should you come here for food. The burger was pathetic at $13 and fries were equally as underwhelming at $6. Real bummed out abiab this, didn't eat all day and was disappointed heavily. There are literally 1000s of better options, including McDonald's.
This place is happening. For real. Good beer. Good music. Gooder service! Shoutout to bartender for, great personality.....
Threes has got it all. Great beer, food and ambience. The outdoor space in the back is amazing. Gowanus has the coolest spots!
Bar/Restaurant/music venue. Music venue is up some steps and small. Room is intimate and nice.
Best place and good beers

Favorite brewery in the area. Lots of different spaces (coffeeshop, live music, food by meat hook, backyard) and great selection of their own as well as other local beers. Home to the spiciest chicken sandwich #nycbeer #drinkoutside #livemusic #ipa #sours #brooklynbeer
Amazing place. Passion fruit beer was amazing. Love this place.
Love their great selection of beers, different seating options and reasonably-priced, delicious food. Good for groups with enough coordination.
Beer selection is great. Kitchen is a bit weird. Menu varies and is not announced by the staff when you make a purchase. Food is also good though. So def a good spot. No wifi though... Like whaa?

The Threes staff helped me plan a fabulous event for my company in their backyard. It felt very customized and semi-private - perfect for our group. The food was amazing and the drinks kept coming. Our servers were attentive and patient.
Who doesn't love Threes? Great beer (their own + other favorites) + great food + awesome vibes.
Nice outdoor seating area. Pretty good beers.  I'm not an IPA guy myself, but the one that my friend ordered here was resfreshingly light but still hop forward.
Loved it
Pricy cheesburger, tiny size.

We brought 30+ people for a get together. For the most part the place was great. Good selection of food and beers. Shortly after it started raining so we all huddled together in the back area under the shade. We put two of the small round tables together to sit. Immediately the bouncer came up to us and in a threatening voice told us we can't do that. The chairs and tables MUST be under the rain and cannot be used or moved. He then proceeded to stand and watch as we put the tables/chairs back under the rain while we stood. Good beer garden but not so welcoming beer garden staff.
Good beer and great patio

Threes has a great space both inside and out back. They have a cafe/bottle shop in the front as you walk in with excellently offered coffee. They also pour guest beers in the tasting room. The food is also very excellent.
Tasty tasty,  finger licking burger!!

Threes Brewing has great beer.  We also ordered food from "Meat Hook" and the cashier randomly put in the tip for us when we were paying.  It was a bit ridiculous since its a take a number/seat your self type of place. when we got the food we still didn't have any silver wear or napkins. I was personally offended after not having a say in leaving a 20% tip that was basically pointless. Needless to say, I still really enjoyed my beer and the atmosphere of the place. Don't think i will be coming back to eat here though. typical brooklyn food service is annoying... we thought a 22 dollar burger and salad would feature a bit more hospitality. Wasn't impressed.
Really good beers, nice place!
Very good craft beer,  coupled with tasty food from The Meat Hook. You can also find a good take out selection of beer from both Threes and other solid craft beer brewers.
Great beer and atmosphere
Great beer and environment
Good beer, cocktails, and visiting taps. Food is usually pretty good too!
Decent beer, nice space overall with a blend of different areas including an outdoor area and coffee bar.  Food from the Meat Hook window simple but good. Staff very helpful and friendly.
Great outdoor area
Great beer spot in Gowanus. Awesome burgers and fries, and the nachos look delicious too!

Very nice space. They have an outdoor area that’s spacious, lively and has its own bar—-although the beer selections outside are limited to 2 beers. Friendly bartender out back.  I was super surprised that the Table beer —- a saison — was so good. Worth the visit. It can get extremely busy inside in the weekends so try out back or the bottle shop for to go. Beers ranged from $6-8.
Good beers, great atmosphere, the food looks really good too.
Good beer. Nice outside seating.

We came here early for brunch and there were plenty of seats.  The backyard was closed for an event.  There is a wonderful selection of beers on tap as well as other types of drinks.  The food was delicious and was ready in a reasonable time.  There were attentive waitstaff that took away the empty beer glasses and plates constantly.  We had a great time and enjoyed the beer list from top to bottom!
Beer was ok, food looked good, but minimal seating made.it tough to enjoy

Good ambience, good beer, great time! Seating can be a bit weird if its packed because you can end up being a two person party at a 10 person table, but not really that big of a deal. Havent tried the food but I hear its really good although a bit on the pricey side.  Beer and drink selection is great and unlike a lot of breweries they serve mix drinks as well. The nice thing about their mix drinks is that some include their beers as part of the mix.
Food is average
Relaxed atmosphere and a very large selection of boutique home brewed beers.

Always good on the weekends, especially when the weather is nice. This place is a staple. They have a huge beer selection, a separate takeout place for food, and an outdoors area for hanging out. Just a really solid bar and their beers are very good/very refined for those that are serious about beer. Cheers!
Excellent saisons and live music in a small room upstairs. Love it.
Great place, great beer, very nice atmosphere
Great local brewery with quality farm to table burgers and other rotating pub fare. Also has a big, year-round backyard!
Good beer selection. Delicious food. Nice atmosphere. Nice back garden (even in poor weather!)
Pretty chill place to enjoy craft 🍺 and food. I only tried a DDH IPA but if I had more time, I would have loved to have tried a few more 🍺 (threes Brewing has a lot of highly rated 🍺 on Untappd).
Great selection of styles for just about anyone.
Excellent IPAs with a cozy bottle shop upstairs.
I love e the people here
Decent venue
Great spot to grab a few beers and some snacks. Many draft options and a quite a few packaged beers to go available as well
Good beer and vibe of the place.  They have live music playing at times. Good back patio with a lot of sitting options.
Good beer, great space, can accommodate crowds. If they have the unreliable narrator on tap you should get it
Great vibe, great selection of beers and great garden
Great beer selection. Good prices. Excellent atmosphere and very cool layout
Very lively and great atmosphere
Great Brewery and bar. Food on site. Friendly staff.
Lucky to have this on my doorstep. Lovely in the summer with the outdoor seating. So many good beers.
Can get very crowded if they dont openup the back area but its a fun time
Great beer. Fun crowd
Great environment with lots to choose from to for your taste. Bartender was very friendly and helpful.

Beer selection is amazing and atmosphere is very cool. They have a rotating food selection, all have been great but kind of overpriced. Only reason it's not a 5 star is because the place gets pretty busy and they could use a couple more workers so the wait for service isn't so long
not really that great and the staff was really disrespectful.
It is a brewery but it is not straightforward that you can buy a beer to bring it home
Great bar with a lively atmosphere. Serving great beers also!
Great brews!  Will plan a return visit asap.
One of BK's best breweries, paired with the best BK brewery space.
Good food. Great beer.
Great selection of beers and chill atmsophere. Also plenty of wines and spirits. We stopped there before heading to a basketball game at Barclays Center.

I came here for the first time with a few friends on a busy Saturday night. It was pretty crowded outside (where they have heated tents) so our best bet for space was to sit inside across from the main bar. The music was too loud to hear anyone else but the person next to you, and the lighting was too dim to read the extensive menu (I swear, my generation will be blind and deaf by the time we're 50).  It would have been a better experience had we been able to sit outside, so maybe next time I'll try to come earlier or visit on a weekday. It was also a bit of a struggle trying to order drinks, because it was hard to get out of the booth we were in and squeeze our way up to the bar. It would have been nice to offer table service or a better ordering system.  But overall, the vibe and the beers were great, and we had a fun time. Just know what to expect when coming here.
Good beer

Only sat at the bar and sampled different 5oz options (priced at $3 or $4) of the beer on tap. Which was a really awesome way to just kick it and chat while tasting a variety, though not a big list by any stretch—probably around 20 beers on tap. Good enough for those who like trying different beers, but maybe not for others who only stick to certain ones.
Very nice food and beer, large selection. Had the burger and fries

We can't say enough about Threes!  We frequently swing by on the weekend to sample from their innovative beer list, and this past fall we hosted our wedding there, and we're so glad that we did!  The backyard area fits a large crowd, and with such a pretty backdrop there isn't much needed in the way of additional decoration.  The Meat Hook provided more than enough food to keep our friends and family happy, including vegetarian and vegan options.  The best part in hosting an event at Threes, though, is the incredible staff.  Gretchen helped us plan every detail of the event, and was quick to respond to all of our questions.  On the day of the event, the entire Threes staff was incredibly accommodating, making sure things went off without a hitch.  Our wedding was one of the happiest days of our lives and, thanks to Threes, stress-free (with plenty of beer)!  We would absolutely host an event there again soon!
Wonderful atmosphere with a great selection of beer
Great beer and food
(Translated by Google) was, I liked it, it was tasty, there was a cool company nearby  (Original) был, понравилось, вкусно, рядом была прикольная компания
Fantastic place in brooklyn! I love this place! Great beers, atmosphere, patio etc ! Super highly recommended!

Service was great ! My car had major issues and they did a great job , making it feel like new again .... I've had a relationship with larenzutti motors for many years,  great bunch of guys....great service! !!
Countless selection of craft beers! Phenomenal Chef--really knows how to cook a steak!!
Excellent beer selection nice, fast and friendly service definitely will come back. Citi bike is real close so you can bike and burn your beer calories.
Great backyard. Nice beers and ciders. Nice staff.
Amazing beer selection. Meat Hook drops the mic on food service. Get the burger. Get the hot chicken.
What can I say. Beer, food full bar, beer garden.
Gorgeous brewpub with a big selection of beers. They definitely range from safe to out there but I've never been disappointed.
Nice space ... Garden is surprisingly large and secluded. Good gathering place.  Would use for partying. Only had drinks. Didn't try Good.
Nice place but the patio is infested with giant rats. Beware if your date is skeeved out by rats.
Solid NE style IPAs, clean roomy space, but I think LIC Beer Project or Other Half are doing better.  Definitely worth a visit though.
Quite rude.. :/
Very knowledgeable staff, solid selection of spirits, great beer which is brewed in house.  The atmosphere is nice.  Very clean.

It's nice to discover a place with fantastic beer and brewery prices in NYC! Haven't had the food yet, but they make good beer and host a solid line up as well, not to mention that the venue is awesome and the staff are cool.

A fine brewery with hints of brewpub. Large selection of beers including guest taps. Their beer won't blow your mind but it won't let you down either. They serve a mean Schwartzbier. Nice patio out back. Kinda crowded. Nearby to other breweries in the area, so a great addition to a bike and brew circuit. Cycling Cicerone approved.
Amazing selection of beer, they make award winning beer but they also have cans of 'best in show's from other local producers.  A beer lovers paradise. The food is damn good as well.

What can I say threes got it right. The beer they brew has never failed to give my mouth joy. The service is too notch there is not a time where I felt like I was not getting the best service. I don't often get the food but when I do I am never disappointed. Go to Threes spend the day in the backyard. You will not be disappointed.
Excellent craft beer and good food as well

I always refer to this place as a brewery, but its really has so many faces:  1. Front of the house has a little coffee shop. Ambiance is great, but I haven't tried anything here so I'm not including it in this write-up. This space also …
Good beer good food GREAT music
Hey why you guys never answer the phone? Btw are under 21 allowed?(won't be drinking)
I like this place a lot! Food, music and the scene was all real nice. I'll. E coming back again for sure!
Always unique selection of beers and ciders. The backyard is adorable. Food is good too if your looking for something easy.
Good beer, good food, but everything just a little more expensive than you'd expect.
Great beer, great vibe, good people, lots of seating and lots of space in the backyard.
Very nice place, smiles on everyone working there, good service and beautiful ambiance :)
Great outdoor space and good good
Full bar and food + awesome house craft beer.
Awesome beer.
if u have a phone number have someone to pick it up. Why should I drive there and plan anything if I dont even know if you guys still exist?
Great outdoor space. Good beer. The food looks delicious. But I did not order anything.

(Translated by Google) 5 minutes walk from Red Lion Inn in Brooklyn. You can drink delicious beer で in micro brewery. You can enjoy a nice atmosphere with cheeseburger and beer. 5 minutes on foot from the Red Lion Inn, Accommodation Hotel Brooklyn.With micro brewery, you can drink delicious beer 🍺. Hands down the best brewery in NYC. Great beers, amazing garden, wonderful staff.
Full liquor bar, craft beer with a strong focus on locally brewed beers, pop up restaurant , outdoor space and laidback atmosphere.
(Translated by Google) I love it! Thanks, Nelci  (Original) I love it! Thanks, Nelci

The yard is the best thing about this place. Very good place for a drink: Lots of seating, green (hops growing over a wire), shade and an outside bar. For beer tastings you have to go inside however. The beers they brew will be liked by IPA lovers, of which I'm not one, but fortunately they have a lot of other good choices.

Absolutely amazing spot.  No expense spared on this space.  Gorgeous bar, cafe with performance space, and courtyard.  The bartenders were extremely friendly and knowledgeable.  The beers were wonderful.  I ran down most of the list and enjoyed them all.  Very fresh with no off-flavors.  The food was from another entity that resides in the same space called The Meat Hook and it was delicious.  I left with a happy full belly  and an armload of fresh canned beer.  This was the quintessential brewery/munchies experience for me.  Cant wait to go back.
Small but well rounded beer selection.  Great food from the meat hook
Awesome selection of beers and great food from The Meat Hook. The outdoor space is chill.
Good food, pretty good beer. Nice vibe.
Brewery with food options and cocktails for non craft beer lovers. Also, coffee shop located upstairs has local craft beer cans to go. Loved the atmosphere and outdoor seating was an added bonus.

Had a delicious pilsner here - Threes Kicking and Screaming. It had a robustness of flavor known more often in IPA's thab pilsners but without the bitterness that often accompanies an IPA. The rest of the drink menu was also very interesting - worth a sample if you're looking for some noteworthy beer selections.
Good beers but brutally small portions for how expensive the food is.
Busy local brewery with a lot of seating and great patio area. They do have food, but we didn't eat. Looked good though.
Recommended by a fellow climber at Dumbo Boulders. Cool atmosphere, nice outdoor patio, and good selection of beer. The Internal Contradictions was my favorite.
Beers are delicious. I've just had issues with service the last two times.
Great beer.

Great beers brewed by Threes and always a great selection of beers from other amazing breweries like Other Half, Hill Farmstead, Interboro, KCBC and others. Also check out the bottle shop for great selection of beers to go.
Great place to bring a group, has plenty of room.  There is a tented area with tables in the back as well as a small outdoor spaces between the tent and the bar.
Nice place, food is ok  ! Very crowded on Sunday night !
Great beer! Loved the IPAs. Need to come back and try the food, too.
Perfect selection of beers produced on premises combined with the friendliest folks eager to assist you to discover what you like from pilsners to stouts and beyond.

Great beer list, large space, but not great food. I don't really get the concept. I guess they feature caterers or other restaurants that come in and prepare the food on their changing menu? Regardless, the food hasn't been good either time I've been.

Really nice atmosphere to the place. Decent selection of beer, although most are of the IPA/Saison "variety". The backyard is great and a nice heated tent. Only gripe would be the Meat Hook restaurant food which is incredibly overpriced. The food is decent but not exceptional. I'd eat elsewhere.
